tool.name: ScriptManager: Single-End Statistics
tool.description: Output BAM Header including alignment statistics and parameters given any indexed (BAI) BAM File.
tool.command:
cp $input1 tmp.bam && samtools index tmp.bam && java -jar $__tool_directory__/S@JAR_FILENAME@ bam-statistics se-stat tmp.bam
&& cp tmp.bam $output1
tool.help:
**What it does**
Output BAM Header including alignment statistics and parameters given any indexed (BAI) BAM File.
